titles.title: Commending the American Academy of Arts and Sciences and its 231st Class of members on the occasion of the institution's October 1, 2011, Induction ceremony in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1732)
Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce. (text of measure as introduced: CR E1732)

bill.summary: 9/29/2011--Introduced. Extends congratulations to the American Academy of Arts and Sciences and its 231st class of members. Salutes the Academy for its continuing service and intellectual leadership around the country and across the world.
